response_parsed.title: Documenting Microservices Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to effectively document your microservices using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+, enhancing the user experience and improving code maintainability.
key_points: FastAPI is a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs with Python.
FastAPI provides automatic API documentation using OpenAPI and JSON Schema.
Proper documentation helps improve API usability, onboarding of new developers, and reduces maintenance efforts.
Python 3.12+ offers various improvements to the language that are applicable when working with FastAPI.
version_notes: Python 3.12+ features performance improvements and PEP 683, which provides support for union types.
FastAPI 0.71.0 supports the new union type functionality in Python.
caveats: Ensure that your documentation is up-to-date and accurate to avoid confusion among users and maintainers.
While FastAPI automatically generates API documentation, manual updates may still be necessary for complex scenarios.
